alert.note: Alert for DeKalb (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 10:33PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central DeKalb County through 1100 PM EDT... At 1033 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Clarkston, or near Decatur. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Decatur, Clarkston, Stone Mountain, Avondale Estates, Pine Lake, Tucker, North Decatur, North Druid Hills, Belvedere Park, Druid Hills, Candler-Mcafee, Redan and Scottdale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
